title: Wanda Nara reveals Mauro Icardi could have left Inter for arch-rivals Milan
text:
Mauro Icardi could have swapped Inter for arch-rivals Milan, according to his wife-cum-agent Wanda Nara.

The Argentina striker was always poised to leave the blue half of Milan last summer, after falling out spectacularly with supporters and the club itself.

He eventually sealed a loan move to Paris Saint-Germain late on in the window, but Nara has revealed he had the opportunity to stick around at the San Siro.

Mauro Icardi could have joined Inter's rivals Miland instead of Paris Saint-Germain this summer

'We had the possibility to take Mauro to Milan,' she said on Tiki Taka, as reported by Football Italia.

'Personally it would have been a more comfortable choice, to stay in Milan, but a team like PSG have been the best decision of his career.

'Going to France was a difficult choice for me, seeing as I have just arrived here from Paris and tomorrow I go back. My children are in Paris. But this was better for Mauro's career.'

Icardi has started strongly in Paris, scoring seven goals in as many appearances for the Ligue 1 leaders in all competitions.
description: The Argentina striker was always poised to leave the blue half of Milan last summer, after falling out spectacularly with supporters and the club itself, but he could have stayed at the San Siro.
